titles.title: To protect State and Federal judges by clarifying that Federal judicial immunity covers all acts undertaken by judges pursuant to legal authority.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/10/2006--Introduced. Amends the federal judicial code to grant immunity to each justice or judge of the United States and each justice or judge of a state against any federal civil cause of action arising from or as a result of the discharge of any legislatively or constitutionally authorized duty, unless the justice or judge, in the course of discharging such duty, was committing a crime.
